title: Use the Defense Production Act for more than just ventilators - The Washington Post
description: Use the Defense Production Act for more than just ventilators The Washington Post Trump Orders GM to Build Ventilators Bloomberg Politics In reversal, Trump uses Defense Production Act to force GM to make ventilators Yahoo News Why the Defense Production Act …
content: The administrations response has been bizarre. The president authorized using the law, then said it wasnt needed because industry is doing enough voluntarily (a claim that clearly isnt true). Federal Emergency Management Agency Administrator Peter T. Gaynor a… [+5663 chars]
